column5: English
column11: English

column4: フランバード＿冷静な顔

column5: Who are YOU people?
column11: Who are you people?

column4: フィン・ディー＿冷静な顔
やっぱり、フランバード。
column5: So it WAS you, Flambard.
column11: So was you, Flambard.

column4:
爆の人形師フランバードさん
ですね。
column5: This is the Bomb Puppermaker, Flambard.
column11: You're the Bomb Pupper Maker, Flambard.

column4: フランバード＿冷静な顔

column5: That's right.
column11: That's right.

column4:
まさか、オレを訪ねて
こんなところまで来たのか？
column5: Don't tell me you came all the way out here to see me?
column11: Don't tell me, you came all the way out here to see me?

column5: How capricious of you.
column11: How whimsical.

column4: フィン・ディー＿冷静な顔

爆工房を再建したんですね。
こんな場所で。
column5:
You've rebuilt the Bomb Workshop, haven't you?
In a place like this?
column11:
You've re-built the Bomb Workshop, haven't you?
In a place like this...

column4: フランバード＿冷静な顔

column5: Yeah.
column11: Yeah.

column4:
今も実験を続けてる。
危ないから、
近づかない方がいいぞ。
column5:
I'm continuing my experiments. 
It's dangerous here, so you'd better not get too close.
column11:
I'm continuing with my experiments. 
It's dangerous here, you'd better not get too close.

column4: フィン・ディー＿冷静な顔

さっきの人形、核撃人形ですね。
まだあんな実験を！
column5: Wasn't that Puppet just now the Nuclear Puppet? You're still doing THOSE experiments!
column11:
The mech we saw just now was the Nuclear Artillery Mech, wasn't it?
To think you're still doing such an experiment!

column4: フランバード＿冷静な顔

だから、こういう場所で
やっている。
column5: That's why I'm working all the way out here.
column11: That's why I'm doing it all the way out here.

column4:
ここなら事故がおこっても
巻き込まれる者はいない。
column5: If there's an accident, there's nothing around here that can get caught up in the aftermath.
column11: If there's an accident, there's nothing around here that can get caught in the aftermath.

column4: フィン・ディー＿怒って無視

column5: That research is forbidden.
column11: It's forbidden research.

column4: フィン・ディー＿冷静な顔

マリオネーションギア協会は
爆工房を認めるわけには
いきません。
column5: The Marionation Gear Association cannot condone the activities of the Bomb Workshop.
column11: The Marionation Gear Association cannot approve of the Bomb Workshop.

column4: フランバード＿基本姿勢

column5: Suit yourselves.
column11: Suit yourselves.

column4: フィン・ディー＿怒って無視

爆工房の人形は危険です。
ですが……用途がないわけでは
ありません。
column5: The Bomb Workshop's Puppets are dangerous. Yet...it's not like they don't serve a purpose.
column11: The Bomb Workshop mechs are dangerous. However...it's not like they don't serve a purpose.

column4:
闇の人形師との戦い。
そのために、爆人形の力が
役にたつでしょう。
column5: In our battle against the Dark Puppetmaker, the power of a Bomb Workshop Puppet may be useful.
column11: The battle against the Dark Puppet Maker. To that end, the power of the Bomb Workshop's mechs may prove useful.

column4: フランバード＿冷静な顔

column5: You've got me wrong again.
column11: You're misunderstanding me again.

column4: 軍事用だと決め付けるな。
column5: You're stuck on the idea that they're for military purposes.

column4:
戦いのための人形じゃねぇ。
オレは、平和利用のために
作ってる。
column5: These Puppets weren't built for the sake of fighting. I'm making them to be used for peace.
column11: These mechs weren't built for the sake of fighting. I'm making them to be used for peace.

column4: フィン・ディー＿ちょっとした驚き

column5: Huh?
column11: Huh?

column4: フランバード＿基本姿勢
ダイナマイトと同じだ。
column5: They're the same as dynamite.
column11: It's like dynamite.

column4:
山を崩して切り開いたり、
建物を解体したり、
いくらでも使い道はある。
column5: You can use them to clear mountains, demolish buildings, whatever you like.
column11: They can be used to clear mountains, demolish buildings, and so on.

column4:
ようは使い方しだいだ。
弾工房なんかと一緒にするな。
column5: It's all about the way they're used. Don't lump me in with the Bullet Workshop.
column11: My point is, it's all about the way they're used. Don't lump me together with the Bullet Workshop.

column4: フィン・ディー＿難色を示す
で、売ってくれるんだろ。
column5: So...you'll sell them to us?
column11: So, you're selling them?

column4: フランバード＿冷静な顔

column5: Yeah.
column11: Yeah.

column4:
意外とあっさり
売ってくれるんだな。
column5: Well, that was easier than I expected.
column11: That was easier than I expected it to be.

column4: フランバード＿基本姿勢

まあ、お前らは協会の
お墨付きらしいしな。
column5: You've got the Association's endorsement, after all.
column11: Well, you've got the Association's endorsement.

column4:
オートマンとの戦いに使うのも、
おもしろいかもしれん。
column5: It could be interesting to see them used against Automen.
column11: It could be interesting to see them used against Automen.

column4:
ただ、爆人形が平和利用の
ためのものだということは
忘れないでくれ。
column5: But you can't forget that Bomb Puppets were meant to be used for the sake of peace.
column11: However, you mustn't forget that the Bomb Mechs were meant to be used for the sake of peace.

column5: Got it!
column11: Got it.

column4: フランバード＿冷静な顔

それと、核撃人形は
まだ未完成だ。
column5: And I haven't yet perfected the Nuclear Puppet.
column11: And, I haven't yet perfected the Nuclear Artillery Mech.

column4:
完成までには
もう少し時間がかかる。
column5: It'll take a bit longer before it's complete.
column11: It will take a bit longer before it's completed.

column4:
まずは、爆砕人形を
使ってみるんだな。
column5: In the meantime, you can try using the Blast Puppet.
column11: In the meantime, you can try using the Blast Mech.
